alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:35PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 735 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Midway, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Macon Community Park, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Walker Ford Community Center, South City, Griffin Heights, Fred George Park, Lake Ella, Callen Neighborhood, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall and Midtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
